title: Extreme sporadic lag...
body: This might just be NZ players, but 3 of the guys on my team in the last game (me included) randomly d/c'd for 30-60 seconds duration every ~5mins or so. 2 Aussies on the team were unaffected and were lamenting our shitty NZ internet (though I'm not 100% sure that's the cause of the problem). Anyone else experienced this?

replies.body: There's some problems with the servers, at least yesterday. Of course, Riot haven't done anything about it yet, with the server status remaining on "Online".
yeah everyone except for one person is disconnecting on our team
inb4 it's that one person Ddos'ing everyone

yep, same here. NZ internet as well. Ping and FPS were entirely stable for 90% of the entire match, but I was randomly d/cing after 5 mins or so as well. Also been recently experiencing high ping spikes going from 80 --->1100 randomly on Sunday although did not have this issue today.
